title: Kenya's cost-of-living crisis: 'I can't afford rice for my children'
description: Florence Kambua has no choice but to salvage waste from a dump site in Kenya's capital to survive.

title: Ben Raemers: The skateboarding hero who couldn't handle fame
description: When Ben Raemers killed himself at the top of his game, it left many skateboarders asking questions.

title: Using human hair to fight oil spills
description: A hairdresser in Wales is collecting her customers' hair and turning it into something useful.

title: Bihar: Their son vanished - then an imposter took over for 41 years
description: An Indian man, pretending to be a missing son, deceived the boy's family for over four decades.

title: The retailers setting up shop in the metaverse
description: As brands join the new virtual universe they have to choose exactly where to locate themselves.

title: Finding the Higgs: ‘Incredible’ moment in science
description: Cern physicist Dr Andre David describes the moment scientists found the ‘God particle’

title: Ukraine round-up: Russia takes Lysychansk and border city hit
description: After weeks of heavy fighting Ukraine withdrew from Lysychansk - the latest eastern city to fall.

title: The Railway Children sequel gets premiere at original Yorkshire station
description: Jenny Agutter and her new co-stars travel to Oakworth, 52 years after the classic film's release.

title: Emotional Sue Barker gets Centre Court ovation
description: Watch Sue Barker receive a standing ovation from the Centre Court crowd after John McEnroe pays an emotional tribute to the BBC presenter.

title: St Paul's Carnival: Scaled-down event honours elders
description: Instead of the full event, community elders were honoured at St Paul's Carnival in Bristol.

title: Chris Pincher: New claims emerge against former Tory MP
description: Six new claims of inappropriate behaviour from over a decade come after the former Tory MP was suspended.

title: Ukraine blamed by Russia for deadly blast in border city of Belgorod
description: Ukraine dismisses claims that its forces targeted homes in the Russian city of Belgorod, killing three.

title: Peter Brook: British stage directing great dies aged 97
description: His works, featuring theatre's most distinguished names, both enthralled and shocked audiences.

title: Wimbledon: Watch Nick Kyrgios hit back at Stefanos Tsitsipas for bullying claims
description: Nick Kyrgios hits back at Stefanos Tsitsipas for accusing him of bullying and says the Greek player is "soft" following their controversial four-set thriller at Wimbledon.

title: What happened when England last hosted the Women's European Championship?
description: Seventeen years after England last hosted the Women's European Championship, the tournament is back in the country but what was it like in 2005 and was it a success?

title: England v India: Redemption for Jasprit Bumrah as he catches Ben Stokes
description: Watch as Ben Stokes loses his wicket as Jasprit Bumrah takes a sensational catch

title: Sydney floods: Tens of thousands told to evacuate
description: Roads have been cut off, with 18 evacuation orders in western Sydney alone and warnings of more to come.

title: Taiwan: China attack not imminent, but US watching closely, says Gen Milley
description: Top US general Mark Milley says China clearly is developing the capability to be able to attack Taiwan.

title: LIV Golf: Paul Casey joins breakaway series as Branden Grace wins in Portland
description: Paul Casey becomes the latest high-profile golfer to join the Saudi-backed LIV Golf Series.

title: The Papers: PM 'turned blind eye' and Charles honours claim
description: Boris Johnson has been accused of failing to act on Chris Pincher allegations sooner, papers report.

title: Three police die in 'pure hell' Kentucky shooting
description: The officers are killed along with a police dog as they try to serve a warrant for domestic violence.

title: Boris Johnson's 40 new hospitals pledge faces watchdog review
description: The Conservatives said in their 2019 election manifesto the facilities would be built by 2030.

title: US woman denied termination in Malta: 'I was terrified'
description: Andrea was medically evacuated to Spain as doctors in Malta could not terminate her pregnancy under the country's ban on abortion.
